text: Krisztián Nagy (born 18 July 1995) is a Hungarian professional footballer who plays for Kaposvári Rákóczi FC. ==Club statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |-||-||-||-|- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Nagyatád |- |2013–14 |13||2||1||0||–||–||14||2 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |Total||13||2||1||0||0||0||14||2 |- |rowspan="8" valign="center"|Kaposvár |- |2014–15 |29||3||2||1||–||–||31||4 |- |2015–16 |31||29||5||2||–||–||36||31 |- |2016–17 |29||7||1||0||–||–||30||7 |- |2017–18 |26||4||1||0||–||–||27||4 |- |2018–19 |28||5||3||0||–||–||31||5 |- |2019–20 |17||1||4||1||–||–||21||2 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |Total||160||49||16||4||0||0||176||53 |- |- style="font- weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |rowspan="2" valign="top"|Career Total | |173||51||17||4||0||0||190||55 |} Updated to games played as of 14 March 2020. ==References== *MLSZ *Soccerway Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kaposvár Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Nagyatádi FC players Category:Kaposvári Rákóczi FC players Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság I players
